abstract: Wal-Mart will appoint Sylvia Mathews Burwell, former senior executive of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, to head its corporate foundation.
snippet: Sylvia Mathews Burwell, who had been with the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation global development program, will move to Wal-Mart.
lead_paragraph: Sylvia Mathews Burwell, who had been with the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation global development program, will move to Wal-Mart.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Names Leader for Corporate Foundation
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Names a Leader For Corporate Foundation
headline.seo: Wal-Mart Names a Head for Its Corporate Foundation
